snippet.title: This Means Warp Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1269300/This_Means_Warp

This Means Warp is an upcoming cooperative roguelike game from Outlier Games. For more information come and chat with us using the links below!

In This Means Warp you can play solo or work together with up to 3 crewmates (local or online) as you make your own destiny in a procedurally generated universe. Purchase new weapons/systems for your ship, battle increasingly challenging enemies, and choose your path through a wide array of varied and dangerous encounters. The stakes are high - if your ship is destroyed, it’s game over!

Chat to the developers on Discord: https://discord.gg/QCeQUdP
More information: http://www.ThisMeansWarp.com
